title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.07 - Village of South Glens Falls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8141.07 - Village of South Glens Falls

State Regulations
(a) River Street. The eastbound and westbound roadways of River Street between US
Route 9 and a point 0.2+- mile east of US Route 9. (b) US Route 9. The northbound and southbound
roadways of US Route 9 between River Street and the Village of South Glens

Falls/Town of Moreau line. (c) Hudson Street. Hudson Street between River Street and First Street. (d) First Street. First Street between Hudson

Street and Spring Street. (e) Spring Street. Spring Street between First Street and Second Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8141.07

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
